Package com.nickeson.games.cardgames

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Deck
    Title: Deck.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: An interface for a collection of Playing Cards (Deck) for use in various card games.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Title: Card.java

    Project: Card Games

    Description: A class to define a Playing Card

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
    Dealer
    Title: Dealer.java

    Project: Card Games

    Description: Card Dealer provides ability to deal a Card or Hand

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
    DeckOptions
    Title: DeckOptionsMap.java

    Project: Card Games

    Description: A map of options for building a Deck of Playing Cards

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
    Hand<T extends Card>
    Title: Hand.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: A Player's Collection of Playing Cards

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
    Shoe
    Title: Shoe.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: A Shoe of Standard PlayingCards of specified number of Decks, with and without Jokers

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
    StdDeck
    Title: StdDeck.java

    Project: Blackjack

    Description: A Standard Playing Card Deck using options from DeckOptions

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies
